items.summary:
For today only over at B&H, we are tracking one of the best deals ever on an M4 MacBook Pro. We have tracked a ton of $300 discounts on the most affordable end of the both the M4 and M4 Pro MacBook Pro lineup over the last couple months. In fact, these deals were readily available since early July and have just recently jumped back up to full price at Amazon and other major retailers. But today B&H has a 24GB M4 MacBook Pro at $400 off the list price.

This heavy-duty kitchen countertop refresher usually fetches $330 at full price, with discounts over the year having taken the costs down to this same rate or stopping it a bit higher at $250. While we have seen it go lower in the past, you’re otherwise looking at the best price we have tracked over 2025, with the 30% markdown here cutting $100 off the tag for you.

items.title: EGO’s modular Nexus power station with two 7.5Ah batteries can also refuel your arsenal at $899 (Reg. $1,099)
items.summary:
At Amazon, you can currently find the EGO Power+ Nexus Portable Power Station with two 7.5Ah batteries at $899 shipped. This bundled package usually runs for $1,099 without discounts, which we’ve mostly seen keeping down near $999 with discounts. While these drops to $899 are usually rare sightings, the price has been holding out strong since mid-August, with no telling how much longer it may last. Aside from the $838 low we saw once back during Black Friday, you’re otherwise looking at the best tracked price, which saves you $200 off the going rate. If you already have a collection of EGO ARC batteries, you can pick the station up on its own for $593.
